ARABIC: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلْفِرْدَوْسَ هُمْ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: who will inherit Firdaws, remaining in it timelessly, for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who will inherit Paradise, and live in it for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that shall inherit Paradise; and in it they shall abide for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: These are the heirs of Paradise wherein they will live forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who will get the inheritance of Paradise; they will abide in it forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who shall inherit Firdaws. They shall dwell therein forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who shall inherit the Paradise; they shall abide therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who shall inherit Paradise therein dwelling forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who will inherit paradise. There they will abide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: they shall abide in it forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who shall inherit Paradise; therein they shall be abiders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who shall inherit paradise and will remain in it [forever].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Who will inherit Paradise: they will dwell therein (for ever).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who shall inherit the Firdaus (Paradise). They shall dwell therein forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who will inherit Paradise; they shall live there for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Who will inherit Paradise, wherein they will dwell forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who will inherit al-Firdaus. They will abide therein eternally.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:11] who shall inherit Paradise (al-firdaws), the name of a garden, the highest of the gardens of Heaven — wherein they will abide; herein is an allusion to the Return [in the Hereafter] and so it is fitting that the Beginning [of creation] should be mentioned next:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who will inherit) who will dwell in (Paradise) the chamber the Beneficent: (There they will abide) in Paradise forever, never to die or come out.
